actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-655.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 398 - 2 (Record Vote No: 214).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 4259) to amend the Act of February 11, 1895 (28 Stat. 651), to authorize the donation of certain non-Federal lands within the boundaries of the Gettysburg National Military Park.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4259 (Gettysburg National Military Park).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 4259) to amend the Act of February 11, 1895 (28 Stat. 651), to authorize the donation of certain non-Federal lands within the boundaries of the Gettysburg National Military Park.
